function.name: GetRCBoolDef
function.description: Gets a Boolean value from the configuration database.

parameter.name: pszKeyName
parameter.description: Name of the key to retrieve.

parameter.name: fDefault
parameter.description: Default value to return if the key cannot be found in the configuration database.

return.description: If the key is found, the return value is the value from the configuration database. If the key cannot be found, the return value is the value of the fDefault parameter.
